snippet: As profits and sales slip, some European companies are scrambling to pay their bills, at a time when banks grow increasingly hesitant to lend.
abstract: As profits and sales slip, some European companies are scrambling to pay their bills, at a time when banks grow increasingly hesitant to lend.

headline.main: Europe's Banks Reluctant to Lend to Companies in Need of Cash
headline.print_headline: European Banks Loath To Lend to Companies
